scriptItem.scriptCode:
import hoodle_utils import tempfile import os.path
lopnode_name = kwargs["node"].name() write_path = ("{}__{}.usdc").format(tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile().name, lopnode_name) write_path = write_path.replace('\\', '/')
# export the stage to a temp file kwargs["node"].activeLayer().Export(write_path)
# tell noodle to load the temp file noodle_instance = hoodle_utils.get_noodle_instance() noodle_instance.usdfile = write_path noodle_instance.load_file()
